channel.title: How to change item prices?
channel.description: where would i go to change the price each item will buy for in a regular market? for instance, party hats are bought for 1gp at a market, and i want them to be bought and sold for more at a market, how do i change that? its a 317 with a testscape source.

item.title: How to change item prices?
item.dc:creator: @chandlerethan chandlerethan
item.description:
@chandlerethan wrote:

got it thanks guys. now to just add talking to npc’s and making my player face their target they are attacking.

Read full topic

item.title: How to change item prices?
item.dc:creator: @Canownueazy Canownueazy
item.description:
@Canownueazy wrote:

[quote=“chandlerethan, post:1, topic:375466”]where would i go to change the price each item will buy for in a regular market? for instance, party hats are bought for 1gp at a market, and i want them to be bought and sold for more at a market, how do i change that? its a 317 with a testscape source.[/quote]Open item.cfg search for the item ID. You’ll see three prices, 1, 1, 1, first is shop price, second high alc, third low alc (I think)

Read full topic

item.title: How to change item prices?
item.dc:creator: @maxsuxx maxsuxx
item.description:
@maxsuxx wrote:

You can do it in Item.class is like this
item = 2677 Attack_cape Its a Attack_cape 99000 99000 99000 0 0 0 0 0 9 9 9 9 9 0 0
Then just change The 99000 99000 99000 to the price you want

Read full topic
